public static int[] sort(double[] array)
Sorts a given array of doubles in ascending order and returns an array of integers with the positions of the elements of the original array in the sorted array. NOTE: this array is not changed by the method!

Parameters:
array - this array is not changed by the method!
Returns:
an array of integers with the positions in the sorted array.
